"""Function to test log_marginal_likelihood."""
kernel_list = [{'type': 'gaussian', 'width': 0.5, 'scaling': 2.0}, {'type':
    'constant', 'const': 1e-06, 'bounds': ((1e-12, None),)}]
regularization = 0.0001
train_matrix, train_targets, test_matrix, test_targets = get_data()
train_features, targets, test_features = scale_test(train_matrix,
    train_targets, test_matrix)
print('Optimizing with analytical jacobian.')
lml_opt(train_features, targets, test_features, kernel_list, regularization,
    global_opt=False)
print('Running global optimization.')
popt_global = lml_opt(train_features, targets, test_features, kernel_list,
    regularization, global_opt=True)
print(popt_global)
kernel_list = list2kdict(popt_global['x'][:-1], kernel_list)
